title: _WDF_INTERRUPT_POLICY (wudfddi.h)
description: Learn how the WDF_INTERRUPT_POLICY enumeration type identifies the affinity policies that the PnP manager can use when it assigns a device's interrupts to the processors of a multiprocessor system.
